stdout:
Table	Create Table
students	CREATE TABLE `students` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `registrationNumber` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `fullName` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `avatarSkinTone` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'light',
  `avatarKimonoColor` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'white',
  `avatarHairStyle` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'short',
  `avatarAccessories` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `avatarHairColor` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'black',
  `avatarKimonoStyle` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'traditional',
  `avatarHeadAccessory` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'none',
  `avatarExpression` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'neutral',
  `avatarPose` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'standing',
  `specialKimono` varchar(30) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'none',
  `avatarGender` enum('male','female') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'male',
  `hd2dCharacterId` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `hd2dUnlockedCharacters` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  UNIQUE KEY `unique_registration_per_user` (`userId`,`registrationNumber`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=750001
